Key:
What are you doing? This is a women's store,
you know?

(I was only visiting because Kotori asked me
to confirm when the sale started, but... I ended
up running into a troublesome group.)
Oh?! Could it be, a present for Tohka-chan?!
I see. It must be! It must be so!

You'll have to find at least one new outfit
for your girlfriend.

I said, that's not it. Besides, I don't have the
money for it...

You can't even afford a nice gift for your
girlfriend?

Then, you'll have to give up your own raw
hide!

Can't you see this is all one big
misunderstanding?!

(I don't know why, but with the trio's vigor
rising, I had to run away from the clothing
store.)

(Ahh. To think I'd abandon Kotori's errand.
I'm scared for what comes next. I'm depressed...)
